ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And what will convey to you what 'llliyun is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But how will you comprehend what 'Illiyun is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And what do you know what the Record of the exalted ones is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Would that you knew what Illiyin is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And what do you know what the Illiyoon are!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And what will make you know what `Illiyyin is
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what will make you know what the highest Iliyin is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and what shall teach thee what is Illiyun?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ah, what will convey unto thee what 'Illiyin is! -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and what will make you understand what the 'Illiyyin is? --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And what will make thee know whatsoever the record in Illiyun is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And what will show you what is Illeeyun?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And what will explain to thee what 'Illiyun is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And what will make you know what 'Illiyyun is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What could let you know what the 'Illiyoon is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But how can you know what Elliyyoon is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:19] and what will tell you, [what will] inform you, what ‘Illiyyūn is?, what the book of ‘Illiyyūn is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Ah, what will convey unto thee) Muhammad (what 'Illiyyin is!) what is in 'Illiyyin.
